item.description:
Would you like to participate in a community of Web Developers, Graphic Designers, and Programmers to share tips and tricks, discuss CSS, PHP, XML, Web Standards, Illustrator, internet security, Photoshop, logo design, SEO, writing proposals and contracts, project managment and other related topics?
Goals: *List meetings/ events for other local programmer/ developer groups and conferences: hidden tech, western mass developers, .net, NAYP, western mass drupal group. *host graphic design workshops/ presentations *host wordpress usergroups *host presentations on relevant topics *host general mtgs for informal socializing and discussion of development, design and programming, industry wide, business, and other topics.
FYI: presentation on the basics of wordpress: http://docs.google.com/Presentation?id=dckjcs92_76gpfcvrdn
Links on left: RESOURCE PAGES: accessed via 'About Us' CALENDAR
RSVPing to events: important, please do it- I like to create and print out participant lists for each event so please list a brief bio, areas of interest or expertise and links to your projects in your profile.
item.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group
